content:
I am Jorge and welcome to my personal page.
As you can see, it is still in development. Some informations are not correct and I am working hard to make it awesome! Come back later, ok?
[AOS LEITORES DA LÍNGUA PORTUGUESA / pt-br]  Também irei fornecer uma versão em português desta página e dos posts, após finalizá-lo.
summary:
I am Jorge and welcome to my personal page.
As you can see, it is still in development. Some informations are not correct and I am working hard to make it awesome! Come back later, ok?
[AOS LEITORES DA LÍNGUA PORTUGUESA / pt-br]  Também irei fornecer uma versão em português desta página e dos posts, após finalizá-lo.
My undergraduate thesis. It uses CNNs to learn emotions from human faces. The hyperparameters are automatically tuned using meta learning.
title: AI Facial Expression Recognition

summary: Web application to help Computer Science students from UFMA in selection of classes in each semester. Built with Laravel, Bulma and SQLite.
title: Planejador CP (UFMA)
